lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, May 1 (AP) -- The German-dominated Paris press made a somewhat restrained effort today to depict United States Ambassador William D. Leahy as expressing approval of Pierre Laval's appointment as leader of the French Government, but American Embassy circles here promptly denied any such implication as "pure invention."
abstract: Paris press repts Amb Leahy confident Laval will not break with U S
